001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader.LoaderService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.LoaderUiElement;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
008import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
011
012/**
013 * A fluent service class for handling loader UI elements in test automation.
014 *
015 * <p>Provides methods to check visibility, validate state, and wait for loader elements to disappear or
016 * become available.
017 *
018 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends {@link UiServiceFluent},
019 * allowing method chaining for seamless interaction.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
024public class LoaderServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
025
026   private final LoaderService loaderService;
027   private final T uiServiceFluent;
028   private final Storage storage;
029   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
030
031   /**
032    * Constructs a new {@code LoaderServiceFluent} instance.
033    *
034    * @param uiServiceFluent The parent fluent UI service instance.
035    * @param storage         The storage instance for storing validation results.
036    * @param loaderService   The loader service responsible for interacting with loaders.
037    * @param webDriver       The smart web driver used for interactions.
038    */
039   public LoaderServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, LoaderService loaderService,
040                              SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
041      this.loaderService = loaderService;
042      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
043      this.storage = storage;
044      driver = webDriver;
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Checks if the specified loader UI element is currently visible.
049    *
050    * @param element The {@link LoaderUiElement} representing the loader component.
051    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
052    */
053   public T isVisible(final LoaderUiElement element) {
054      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Check if the loader UI element is visible");
055
056      element.before().accept(driver);
057      boolean visible = loaderService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
058      element.after().accept(driver);
059      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
060      return uiServiceFluent;
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * Validates that the loader UI element is visible.
065    *
066    * @param element The {@link LoaderUiElement} to validate.
067    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
068    */
069   public T validateIsVisible(final LoaderUiElement element) {
070      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Validate that the loader UI element is visible");
071      return validateIsVisible(element, true, false);
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Validates that the loader UI element is visible with an optional soft assertion.
076    *
077    * @param element The {@link LoaderUiElement} to validate.
078    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether to perform soft validation.
079    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
080    */
081   public T validateIsVisible(final LoaderUiElement element, boolean soft) {
082      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Validate that the loader UI element is visible with soft validation option");
083      return validateIsVisible(element, true, soft);
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Performs validation on whether the loader is visible or hidden.
088    *
089    * @param element         The {@link LoaderUiElement} to validate.
090    * @param shouldBeVisible A boolean indicating the expected visibility state.
091    * @param soft            A boolean indicating whether to perform soft validation.
092    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
093    */
094   private T validateIsVisible(final LoaderUiElement element, boolean shouldBeVisible, boolean soft) {
095      element.before().accept(driver);
096      boolean visible = loaderService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
097      element.after().accept(driver);
098      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
099
100      String assertionMessage = shouldBeVisible
101            ? "Validating loader is visible"
102            : "Validating loader is hidden";
103
104      if (soft) {
105         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
106               softAssertions -> {
107                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
108                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
109                  } else {
110                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
111                  }
112               }
113         );
114      } else {
115         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
116               () -> {
117                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
118                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
119                  } else {
120                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
121                  }
122               }
123         );
124      }
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Validates that the loader UI element is hidden.
129    *
130    * @param element The {@link LoaderUiElement} to validate.
131    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
132    */
133   public T validateIsHidden(final LoaderUiElement element) {
134      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Validate that the loader UI element is hidden");
135      return validateIsVisible(element, false, false);
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Validates that the loader UI element is hidden with an optional soft assertion.
140    *
141    * @param element The {@link LoaderUiElement} to validate.
142    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether to perform soft validation.
143    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
144    */
145   public T validateIsHidden(final LoaderUiElement element, boolean soft) {
146      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Validate that the loader UI element is hidden with soft validation option");
147      return validateIsVisible(element, false, soft);
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * Waits until the specified loader UI element is visible within the given timeout.
152    *
153    * @param element      The {@link LoaderUiElement} to wait for.
154    * @param secondsShown The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for visibility.
155    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
156    */
157   public T waitToBeShown(final LoaderUiElement element, int secondsShown) {
158      Allure.step(
159            "[UI - Loader] [UI - Loader] Wait for the loader UI element to be shown for " + secondsShown + " seconds");
160
161      element.before().accept(driver);
162      loaderService.waitToBeShown(element.componentType(), element.locator(), secondsShown);
163      element.after().accept(driver);
164      return uiServiceFluent;
165   }
166
167   /**
168    * Waits until the specified loader UI element is removed from visibility within the given timeout.
169    *
170    * @param element        The {@link LoaderUiElement} to wait for.
171    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for removal.
172    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
173    */
174   public T waitToBeRemoved(final LoaderUiElement element, int secondsRemoved) {
175      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Wait for the loader UI element to be removed for " + secondsRemoved + " seconds");
176
177      element.before().accept(driver);
178      loaderService.waitToBeRemoved(element.componentType(), element.locator(), secondsRemoved);
179      element.after().accept(driver);
180      return uiServiceFluent;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Waits for the loader UI element to become visible and then disappear within the given time limits.
185    *
186    * @param element        The {@link LoaderUiElement} to wait for.
187    * @param secondsShown   The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for visibility.
188    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for removal.
189    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
190    */
191   public T waitToBeShownAndRemoved(final LoaderUiElement element, int secondsShown, int secondsRemoved) {
192      Allure.step("[UI - Loader] Wait for the loader UI element to be shown and then removed within "
193            + secondsShown + " and " + secondsRemoved + " seconds respectively");
194
195      element.before().accept(driver);
196      loaderService.waitToBeShownAndRemoved(element.componentType(), element.locator(), secondsShown, secondsRemoved);
197      element.after().accept(driver);
198      return uiServiceFluent;
199   }
200
201}
